title: Introducing ChatGPT Enterprise
summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Enterprise, a version of its AI language model designed for businesses. The enterprise-grade solution offers enhanced security and privacy features, unlimited access to the GPT-4 model, longer context windows for processing longer inputs, advanced data analysis capabilities, customization options, and more. ChatGPT Enterprise has already been adopted by industry leaders such as Block, Canva, Carlyle, The Estée Lauder Companies, PwC, and Zapier, who have used it for various tasks including communication, coding, and creative work. The solution aims to empower employees, improve productivity, and protect company data.
